title: Marqasi (province)
description: Gurgum (kingdom) became an Assyrian province after Sargon II captured its capital Marqasi in 711 BC.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. The estimated, representative centerpoint is based on the OpenStreetMap location of Mara≈ü (Akkadian Marqasi).
